response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly benefit and transform your operations. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $1,500,000, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. We are confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, enhancing efficiency and profitability for your business. Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
